MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:12am. Our engineers have arrived at the Edinburgh Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:04am on Thursday, 19 November 2020
